(:action fill ;  Fill an entity and update its status
    :parameters (?entity - object ?npc - person ?location - place)
    :precondition (and
                    (at_location ?entity ?location)
                    (not (filled ?entity))
                    (available ?npc))
    :effect (and
              (filled ?entity)
              (not (empty ?entity))

(:action get ; Obtain a resource and update possession status
  :parameters (?agent - entity ?resource - object ?location - place)
  :precondition (and (at_location ?agent ?location) (available ?resource ?location))
  :effect (and (possess ?agent ?resource) (not (available ?resource ?location))
